popupText: We do not collect any personal data from our visitors. By using this website, you agree to our privacy policy. For more details, please read our full privacy policy

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: At P.L.V DOO we value your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we handle your data when you visit our website.

noPersonalData.title: 2. No Personal Data Collection
noPersonalData.content: We do not collect any personal data from visitors to our website. Personal data includes information like your name, email address, phone number, or any other identifiable information.

cookiesAndTracking.title: 3. Cookies and Tracking
cookiesAndTracking.content:
While we do not directly collect personal data, our website may use cookies and similar technologies to ensure the proper functioning of the site and to improve your user experience.

- Functional Cookies: These cookies are essential for the operation of our website. They do not track personal information.
- Third-Party Services: We may use third-party services, such as analytics tools, that might collect non-personal data such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system. These services help us understand how our website is used and to improve its functionality.

thirdPartyServices.title: 4. Use of Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content:
Our website may rely on third-party services for hosting, analytics, or content delivery. While we do not collect personal data, these third-party providers might process data as part of their service. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of these third-party providers:

- Location detection: https://www.i18next.com/

yourRights.title: 5. Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.content: Since we do not collect personal data, there is no data to request access to, modify, or delete. However, if you have any concerns or questions about our use of cookies or third-party services, please feel free to contact us.

security.title: 6. Security
security.content: We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. While we do not store personal data, we still follow best practices to protect any non-personal data that may be collected through cookies or third-party services.

policyUpdates.title: 7. Updates to This Policy
policyUpdates.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page, so we encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contactUs.title: 8. Contact Us
contactUs.content:
If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us at:

zzlatko44@gmail.com
